mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users
WHERE user_name LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'

SELECT * FROM users
WHERE user_name LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%'

SELECT * FROM content JOIN board ON content.content_no = board.content_no JOIN menu ON board.menu_no = menu.menu_no JOIN users ON content.user_no = users.user_no WHERE board_type = 1
AND menu_no = #{menuNo}
AND (content_title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR content_detail LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' )
ORDER BY content_no DESC

SELECT c.content_no, c.content_title, c.create_date, c.modify_date, c.content_status, c.delete_status, c.user_no, c.md_recommendation, m.menu_name, STRING_AGG(cat.category_name, ',' ORDER BY cat.category_name) AS category_name FROM content c LEFT JOIN content_category cc ON c.content_no = cc.content_no LEFT JOIN category cat ON cc.category_no = cat.category_no LEFT JOIN menu m ON cat.menu_no = m.menu_no WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM board b WHERE c.content_no = b.content_no )
AND cat.menu_no = #{menuNo}
AND (c.content_title LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%' OR c.content_detail LIKE '%' || #{search} || '%')
GROUP BY c.content_no, c.content_title, c.create_date, c.modify_date, c.content_status, c.delete_status, c.user_no, c.md_recommendation, m.menu_name ORDER BY CASE WHEN c.md_recommendation = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, c.content_no DESC
